snippet: You ran out of cigarettes? You want to swear at work? Too bad, said Edward Mike Davis, the owner of Tiger Oil Company who was known as Tiger Mike....
lead_paragraph: You ran out of cigarettes? You want to swear at work? Too bad, said Edward Mike Davis, the owner of Tiger Oil Company who was known as Tiger Mike.

headline.main: From the Memos of the ‘World’s Grumpiest Boss’
headline.print_headline: Out of Cigarettes? You’re Out of Luck
